title: Name choices
content: I am still having issues with the name choices :(. I got yelled at today by someone for wanting to call it mommymilkies.org so I kinda don't wanna go with that any more. Next in line was mogusdrip, so that might be it. Gimmie a day or so and I will try make a page where you can vote on/submit name ideas.

title: Website formatted
content: We now have a nicer looking site. I do need to clone the scheme over to the rest of the pages but that should be fairly easy

title: Initial release
content: Initial creation! We now have a working site! You can't send emails but it can generate spam emails. We will be adding more features soon.
